scenario.init: Measuring probe axis (MPA) is at working position (WP = true, m2WP = true, IP = false, m2IP = false)
scenario.action: The control system commands a move to the initial position (m2IP = true -> m2WP = false)
scenario.expected_result: WP switches to false as the MPA leaves the working position, and IP becomes true within a few seconds (MPA reaches and is recognized at initial position)
scenario.instead_failure: WP remains true - no movement has occurred

diagnoses.name: MPA is stuck = does not move besides being commanded to.
diagnoses.comment: MPA is stuck in working position / move to int  position command is not recognized.
